challenges.title: Q1: Profile Text Formatting
challenges.description: Create a small profile section with your name in bold, your role in italics, and a short description in a paragraph. Use <strong> and <em> instead of <b> and <i>.
challenges.outputDescription: Styled text using semantic formatting tags.
examples: E.g., 'My name is Ram and I am an Engineering Student.'
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Profile Formatting</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Use strong, em and p here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.outputDescription: Clickable link that opens Google in a new tab.
examples: Use target="_blank" and a proper href.
